org.gridgain.grid.spi.discovery.tcp.metricsstore.jdbc
Class GridTcpDiscoveryJdbcMetricsStore

java.lang.Object
  org.gridgain.grid.spi.discovery.tcp.metricsstore.GridTcpDiscoveryMetricsStoreAdapter
      org.gridgain.grid.spi.discovery.tcp.metricsstore.jdbc.GridTcpDiscoveryJdbcMetricsStore
All Implemented Interfaces:
GridTcpDiscoveryMetricsStore
public class GridTcpDiscoveryJdbcMetricsStore
extends GridTcpDiscoveryMetricsStoreAdapter

JDBC-based metrics store.

Configuration

Mandatory

  • Data source (see GridTcpDiscoveryJdbcMetricsStore.setDataSource(DataSource)).

Optional

There are no optional configuration parameters.

The database will contain 1 table to hold nodes metrics (tbl_metrics).
